newsitem.headline: TABLE - Medhold posts pre-excepts H1 loss.

text.p: (*) Included in operating income of 1.49 million rand is 6.7 million rand representing compensation received in respect of operations previously acquired that have underperformed. An additional amount of 3.3 million rand of compensation received has been treated as an exceptional item as it relates mainly to rationalisation costs necessarily incurred.
